name: The Bumblezone (Lv. 5-45)
description: In [Harmony], all zones are scale with your level. All zones are accessible at all times of the game. However, some zones have higher minimum level requirements to enter. It is suggested that you stay in the Overworld for the first few levels before exploring the other dimensions!

quests.name: Bzz Bzz (Daily)
quests.description: If you hit a bee, or take their honey... Don't think there won't be repercussions!

quests.name: Sweet Love (Daily)
quests.description: Honey slimes are found in The Bumblezone!

quests.name: Honey Crystal Shield
quests.description: In [Harmony], when you craft shields, they have a chance of becoming bucklers, towers, or spirit shields.

quests.name: The Bumblezone
quests.description: Going to The Bumblezone is easy! Throw an ender pearl at a beehive. Voila! You've now shrunk yourself enough to enter The Bumblezone. Here you'll find honey, bees... and more honey!
